item.title: Busan Film Festival Expands Vision Section, Launches Innovation Platform
item.description: The 30th Busan International Film Festival has unveiled a significantly expanded Vision section featuring 23 independent films from across Asia, while launching InnoAsia, an ambitious new platform mer
